title: TDC2 Certificate of Excellence font
content:
What is the font on the Certificate of Excellence given by TDC2? I saw it in the news story here:

[http://fontfeed.com/archives/tdc2-the-oscars-of-type-design/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030120/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/tdc2-the-oscars-of-type-design/ "http://fontfeed.com/archives/tdc2-the-oscars-of-type-design/")
author: magnetm

comments.content:
The t/T's don't match Holland Title. The M is great.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100314030120im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font%20TDC2%20certificate%20of%20excellence%202008_3995.jpg)

That’s a new up and coming font from Matthew Carter. I forget what its called. He is working with a seasoned designer (whom I also forget) from Monotype—opentype programming etc.

Mikey :-)
